channel.title: Docs on Writing
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Writing

item.description: Configuration Key Point Example configurations Remark Vale TBC

How to contribute Dependencies Hugo for documentation, please make sure to install the “extended” version. Cloning HTTPS Clone with HTTPS git clone https://github.com/ocular-d/writing-extension-pack SSH Clone with SSH git clone git@github.com:ocular-d/writing-extension-pack.git Initialize make init This command will do the initial setup, like initializing submodules and such. Todo Add docs about how to make a release and needed tooling

Dependencies Prerequisite To enjoy the best experience, please make sure that you have Visual Studio Code, Node.js and all other dependencies installed. Font Hack is the default font. Ubuntu Ubuntu sudo apt install fonts-hack macOS macOS Assumed you’re using Homebrew brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts # Only once brew cask install font-hack Vale Vale is a free, open-source linter for prose built with speed and extensibility in mind.

Included Extensions Code Polacode Bracket Pair Colorizer 2 Code Spell Checker Highlight Matching Tag Indent Rainbow Git GitLens Markdown Markdown Emoji Markdown TOC Remark Remark Lint Writing Word Count Highlight Trailing White Spaces Read Time Vale OpenAPI OpenAPI (Swagger) Editor Icons Material Icon Theme Themes Github Light Theme Night Owl VS-Code Settings Sync
